N.Flying

Introduction

Cha Hun is the Lead Guitarist and Vocalist of the band N.FLYING under FNC Entertainment.

Despite his serious looks, Hun is well-known for his comedic talent, which he showcases on his YouTube channel "2 Idiots," co-hosted with fellow member Jaehyun. Their fans are affectionately referred to as "Professors."
